isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9800 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WIPER LINKAGE

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 69 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Remove wiper motor. Refer to ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR, Remove
.

Remove wiper arm (Item 4). Refer to WIPER ARM, Remove
.
Remove retainer clip (Item 10) from end of pivot arm/linkage assembly shaft (Item 14) and remove serrated driver and rain shield (Items 9 and 8) from the pivot arm/linkage assembly shaft.
Loosen and remove pivot arm nut, steel washer and leather washer (Items 13, 12 and 11) from pivot arm/linkage assembly (Item 14).
Remove 4 mounting screws (Item 15) holding wiper access cover (Item 6) to front of cab.
Remove wiper access cover (Item 6) and access cover seal (Item 7).
Remove 4 mounting screws (Item 17) and remove pivot arm/linkage assembly (Item 14) through access opening in cowl bar.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 69 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place pivot arm/linkage assembly (Item 14) into cowl bar access opening and position pivot arm/linkage assembly in place and secure with 4 mounting screws (Item 17).
Position wiper access cover and access cover seal (Items 6 and 7) over pivot arm/linkage assembly (Item 14) onto front of cab and secure with 4 screws (Item 15).
Place new leather washer (Item 11) and original steel washer (Item 12), if OK, onto the wiper shaft. Secure with pivot arm nut (Item 13). Tighten to 54 to 62 in-lbs. (6 to 7 Nm).
Place rain shield and serrated driver (Items 8 and 9) onto wiper shaft. Secure with retainer clip (Item 10).

Install the wiper arm (Item 4) onto serrated driver (Item 9). Refer to WIPER ARM, Install
.

Install wiper motor. Refer to ELECTRIC WIPER MOTOR, Install
.

Check wiper arm positioning, if adjustment is required, refer to ADJUSTMENTS, WINDSHIELD WIPERS
.
